scripts.dev: concurrently "npm --prefix backend run start:dev" "npm --prefix frontend run dev"
scripts.build:fe: cd frontend && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.build:be: cd backend && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:fe && npm run build:be && npm run clean:fe && npm run copy:fe
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm --prefix backend run start:prod
